title: Responsive Web Design with Bootstrap 5
headline: Create stylish, modern and responsive websites and web apps using Bootstrap 5 with this free online course.
description: Millions of people visit websites daily for work, entertainment or a myriad of other reasons. Responsive web design makes websites enjoyable across devices and screen sizes, improving user engagement, user experience and search rankings. This short course will teach you all you need to know to start creating responsive websites with Bootstrap 5, a front-end web design framework that simplifies the process of creating responsive websites.
courseDescription:
Responsive design has become an industry standard for creating websites. It is known to develop mobile-friendly websites, an increasingly important consideration in web design, which improves search rankings. Google even recommends it! Bootstrap 5 is the latest version of the Bootstrap framework, a combination of HTML, CSS and JavaScript that significantly simplifies building responsive and modern websites. This course will teach you all you need to know to develop responsive websites. The first tutorial helps set up Bootstrap 5 and introduces you to the Bootstrap 5 grid system.

Next, we present the components and forms in Bootstrap 5 and learn to create and style common website components such as badges, alerts, buttons, cards and carousels. We examine how to produce features like navs, pagination, navigation bars, progress bars and tooltips, which help users navigate websites, thus improving the overall user experience. Investigate creating forms, adjusting form layouts and adding form features like input groups and form validation.

This course will teach you to use helpers and utilities to add webpage components like videos, images and screen reader exclusive content. Learn to truncate text, manipulate the size and spacing of elements and create tables. Responsive web design is in increasingly high demand and this course will introduce you to the most popular platform for achieving it. Whether you are a new or experienced web designer, we will polish your skills to help you create highly responsive, cross-platform websites and web apps in only three hours. Start now!
